price: Karena itu, ingatlah kamu kepada-Ku niscaya Aku ingat (pula) kepadamu99, dan bersyukurlah kepada-Ku, dan janganlah kamu mengingkari (nikmat)-Ku.
arabic: فَٱذۡكُرُونِيٓ أَذۡكُرۡكُمۡ وَٱشۡكُرُواْ لِي وَلَا تَكۡفُرُونِ
footnotes: 99.  Maksudnya ialah Aku limpahkan rahmat dan ampunan-Ku kepadamu.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-udh'kurūnī adhkur'kum wa-ush'kurū lī walā takfurūni
